Hero.title: Hotel
Hero.paragraph: The management and staff of the EL KANTAOUI CENTER hotel welcome you and thank you for choosing our hotel. This guide will help you familiarize yourself with the facilities of our hotel and the services we offer. We also invite you to contact the Reception for any additional information. We wish you a pleasant stay.

About.title: About
About.paragraph: The hotel offers four-star accommodation, 346 renovated rooms and suites with all modern amenities, namely satellite TV, safe, telephone, mini-bar, air conditioning.

freeWifi.title: Free Wifi
freeWifi.message: Enjoy the best internet connection in the city.

freeParking.title: Free Parking
freeParking.message: Enjoy the best parking in the city.

resort.title: Resort View
resort.message: Enjoy the best view in the city.

Where.title: Where to find us
Where.paragraph: Located in the heart of Tunisia's first seaside resort, Port El Kantaoui, only 10 minutes from downtown Sousse and 15 km from Monastir airport and 30 km from Enfidha airport. Close to the marina, a marina, a variety of shops, bars, cafes and restaurants, amusement parks: water and theme parks, an international class golf course, a tennis center, a diving center, nightclubs and lounges.

Facilities.title: Our facilities

hotel_info.checkin_checkout: Check-in: 2:00 PM - Check-out: According to international standards, guests are requested to vacate the room on the day of departure by 12:00 PM. However, guests can always leave their luggage in the room designated by the reception if necessary.
hotel_info.services_offered: The Reception offers you the following services:
hotel_info.doctor_pharmacy: Doctor & Pharmacy: inquire at the Reception
hotel_info.inroom_safes: In-room safes: 2 TND per day and a deposit of 25 TND will be paid in advance.
hotel_info.safes_disclaimer: The hotel will not be responsible for valuables deposited outside our safes.
hotel_info.credit_cards: Types of credit cards accepted: Visa, Master Card
hotel_info.mail_service: Mail service: During your absence, we will keep your mail and take note of any message that will be delivered to you.
hotel_info.repairs: Repairs: We hope your room will give you complete satisfaction. If during your stay you notice a lack, please report it to the reception and we will take care of it as soon as possible.
hotel_info.general_info: The El Kantaoui Center hotel has 346 single, double, triple and quadruple rooms, spread over 3 blocks, equipped with 7 elevators. Each block has 4 floors. The coveted rooms share space and sun, all air-conditioned, equipped with telephones, satellite TV, safe (extra charge), mini-bar, hairdryer, and balcony or terrace. The approximate area of the rooms, studios and apartments, including the balcony or terrace, varies between 28m² and 80m².
hotel_info.air_conditioning: Air conditioning: For proper air conditioning operation, please ensure that doors and windows are properly closed.
hotel_info.room_maid_service: Housekeeping service: Your room will be cleaned and arranged daily. Please use the 'Do not disturb' sign if you wish to rest and have it cleaned later. Towels are for in-room use only. If needed for the beach or pool, please contact the Reception (a deposit of 10 TND per towel).
hotel_info.laundry_service: Laundry service: This service takes up to 48 hours. Laundry is delivered before 10:00 AM.
hotel_info.tv_remote: TV remote control: Available at the Reception (deposit of 20 TND).
hotel_info.wakeup_call: Wake-up call: Please arrange with the Reception.

restaurant_info.menu_info: The restaurant offers a rich menu including various dishes, salads and pastries, all fresh and tasty. Open from 5:00 PM to midnight.
restaurant_info.description: The hotel's main restaurant offers a rich buffet and show cooking service.
restaurant_info.access_info: Presentation of a resident access card is required at the entrance of the restaurant (bracelet required).

rules.non_smoking: Inside, the restaurant area is entirely non-smoking.
rules.no_takeaway: It is strictly forbidden to take food, drinks and equipment out of the restaurant.

restaurant_info.note: NB: It is recommended to order your drinks before heading to the buffet to speed up the service (additional drinks).
restaurant_info.ken_zmen_info: Ken Zmen is a Tunisian restaurant offering a variety of traditional dishes in a warm and friendly atmosphere.

juliette.title: Tea Room (Cafe & Lounge)
juliette.description: The Juliette tea room offers a rich menu (coffee, tea, juices of various types) and high-end pastries in a good family atmosphere. Open from 7:00 AM to 12:00 AM.

niagra.title: Niagara snack bar
niagra.description: Located on the 1st floor, opening onto the outdoor pool, this snack bar is known for its quick and light menu. (Open during the summer season) Ideal for a snack or a quick drink by the pool to sip a good glass. Open from 10:00 AM to 4:30 AM.

kalven.title: Kalven club / dancing bar
kalven.description: A soft and captivating atmosphere, alternative music, a pure moment of relaxation and well-being. A trendy club. Open from 8:00 PM to 2:00 AM.

doxa.title: Doxa lounge
doxa.description: The ideal place to enjoy a beautiful setting and a good atmosphere, famous for its cocktails, Tapas and Shooters with live bands. Ideal place for tranquility and privacy lovers. Open from 5:00 PM to 4:30 AM.

hookah.title: Hookah
hookah.description: A marriage of typical scents and colors, a main place of delights (Shisha and Turkish coffee to savor in a very oriental atmosphere). Open from 6:00 PM to 2:00 AM.

el_chedlia.title: El Chedlia
el_chedlia.description: A marriage of typical scents and colors, a main place of delights (Shisha and Turkish coffee to savor in a very oriental atmosphere). Open from 3:00 PM to 4:30 AM.

Facilities.beach_description: Beautiful private sandy beach located 250m from the hotel, equipped with umbrellas, sun loungers and free mattresses for hotel guests (water sports nearby, for a fee).

entertainmentProgram.title: Entertainment program
entertainmentProgram.description: You can check our daytime and nighttime entertainment programs on the Reception notice board.
entertainmentProgram.daytimeEntertainment: Daytime entertainment: aperitif games, darts, dance classes, aqua-gym, gymnastics, beach, volleyball.

nightlife.title: Nightlife
nightlife.description: These activities take place on stage on the lower level in winter and by the outdoor pool in summer and also cater to all age groups.
nightlife.miniDisco: Mini disco for your children from 9:00 PM to 9:30 PM followed by various shows.

sport.title: Sport
sport.description: Discover nearby opportunities for tennis, horse riding, windsurfing, sailing, water skiing, parachuting, outings, sea walks and golf or simply enjoy a simple walk. Please contact the Reception for better information or reservations.

pools.title: Pools
pools.pools1: An outdoor pool located on the 1st floor
pools.pools2: An indoor heated pool located on the lower level
pools.guardedHours: The pools are supervised from 9:00 AM to 7:00 PM. Children must be accompanied at all times by their parents while swimming.

otherServices.title: Other services (Extras)
otherServices.conference: Conference facilities: a multipurpose room (the Marina)
otherServices.conferenceDescription: A seminar room arranged for all your events: weddings, seminars, gala dinners, birthdays; and 5 sub-commission rooms

goodToKnow.title: Good to know

elevator.label: Elevators
elevator.description: Elevators are strictly prohibited for unaccompanied children.

pets.label: Pets
pets.description: Pets are not allowed in the hotel.

quiet.label: Keep quiet
quiet.description: It is requested throughout the hotel to ensure the rest of all guests. Avoid slamming doors or making excessive noise, especially in the hallways.

dress_code.label: Dress code in common areas
dress_code.description: It is strictly forbidden to access common areas such as restaurants, bars and reception in a wet swimsuit, shirtless or barefoot.

baby-cot.label: Baby cot
baby-cot.description: Please contact the reception to have a baby cot placed in your room.

currency.label: Currency and exchange, ATM, car rental
currency.description: All available 24 hours a day at the Reception.

goodToKnow.suggestions: For all your suggestions and comments, do not hesitate to contact us. Our goal is to make your stay a real pleasure and an unforgettable experience. Please inform the Reception if you encounter any inconvenience during your stay. We will do our best to remedy it quickly and efficiently.
goodToKnow.teamWish: The entire hotel team wishes you a pleasant stay.

Contact.title: Get in Touch
Contact.paragraph: Do you have a question or need assistance? Do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to help you.
